summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating design, construction, maintenance, use and occupancy of buildings and amending Section 302, 305, 402, 413, 1001, 1002, 1408, 2720, 3702, 4202, 4203, 5201, 5204, 5206, 5603, and Table No. 5-B of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500); adding new Section 4801 through 4808 thereto and repealing Section 5202 thereof.
